R

removeCompany(Company) - Method in interface daoLayer.CompanyDAO
 
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class daoLayer.CompanyDBDAO
This method removes the company's record from the Mysql data base, using the received company parameter.
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
This method activates the removeCompany method in the companyDBDAO class while sending the received company parameter, eventually removing the company's record from the Mysql data base.
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface daoLayer.CouponDAO
 
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class daoLayer.CouponDBDAO
This method removes the coupon's record from the Mysql data base, using the received coupon parameter.
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class facade.CompanyFacade
This method activates the removeCoupon method in the couponDBDAO class while sending the received coupon parameter, eventually removing the coupon's record from the Mysql data base.
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in interface daoLayer.CustomerDAO
 
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class daoLayer.CustomerDBDAO
This method removes the customer's record from the Mysql data base, using the received customer parameter.
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
This method activates the removeCustomer method in the customerDBDAO class while sending the received customer parameter, eventually removing the customer's record from the Mysql data base.
returnConnection(Connection) - Method in class connection.ConnectionPool
Returning a connection that the use of it is over, back to the pool.
run() - Method in class utils.DailyCouponExpirationTask
the run method that the DailyCouponExpirationTask runs in after it is started.
